verse: ॐ अथ यदिदमस्मिन्ब्रह्मपुरे दहरं पुण्डरीकं वेश्म दहरोऽस्मिन्नन्तराकाशस्तस्मिन्यदन्तस्तदन्वेष्टव्यंतद्वाव विजिज्ञासितव्यमिति॥

terms.ब्रह्मपुरे: Abode of Brahman, the supreme reality

meaning: Ek brahmpur hai usmai 1 ghar hai, us ghar mai 1 angan hai, us angan mai 1 rehasy usako janana hai wahi mera hai. yeah sharir brahmpur hai, ismai 1 ghar hai hriday jismai brahm rehata hai, us hriday mai daharakash hai bhagwan hai, us daharakash(bhagwan) mai 1 rehasy hai usako janana hai
meaning-gpt: Now, in this abode of Brahman, which is a small space resembling a lotus, and in this inner space within it, one should seek and inquire into that which is inside

upnishad-org.meaning: Om. There is in this city of Brahman an abode, the small lotus of the heart; within it is a small akasa. Now what exists within that small akasa, that is to be sought after, that is what one should desire to understand.
